data.title: Travel Guide to the Show
data.meta_description: Comprehensive travel guide for the Royal Windsor Horse Show. Options for train, car, and coach travel to Windsor Castle's private grounds.
data.text:
Parking costs Â£12 and can be booked in advance at the point of purchasing your tickets. All Royal Windsor Horse Show Club members receive free advance car parking as a part of their membership.

You may also pay for parking on arrival at the show, though there is limited space so you may be disappointed.

PLEASE NOTE: All parking on site must be paid for by card, no cash will be handled by the car parking attendants.

The main public car park is located in Home Park Public, opposite the Box Office entrance to the Show. Parking is on grass and is around a 5-10 minute walk to the Showground itself. Spaces are limited so we do recommend booking in advance.

Access car parking is located in the King Edward VII Car Park. It is available to Blue Badge holders only and must be booked in advance when booking your tickets.

Limited coach parking is available for the 2024 Show, and can be booked through the Box Office.
